products.name: Debut Theme Slider (PRO)
products.details:
Premium quality, hand coded slider for one of the best free themes of Shopify: Debut. Coded by a certified Shopify partner.


One image is worth a thousand words, but one live preview's worthiness is beyond evaluation! So check this slider working live here: 


https://debut-theme-slider.myshopify.com/products/blue-silk-tuxedo


Installation takes less than 1 minute. 


You just need to copy and paste the files that come with this. Detailed instructions plus all features can be found here: 


https://ezfycode.com/blog/debut-shopify-theme-how-to-add-swipe-for-product-page-images


This code will be constantly updated with new features subsequently making its price go up, so make sure you get your copy now while it's cheap. 


I give 100% support to all of its users to ensure that what you're seeing in the demo page is exactly what you see on your website, same day responses are guaranteed.


If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to me:


ezfycode@gmail.com


Note: This code works exclusively on the Debut theme.


FAQ:


Question: I'd like to include extra options into my slider, like move the position of the arrows, autoplay, etc. Can you do it?

Answer: At the moment we unfortunately do not offer customized options.


Q: My product page is already customized. Can I integrate this slider into it since I can't delete everything in the product-template?

A: Absolutely. We offer the custom integration as an additional service that ranges between $20 - $50 USD depending of how many customizations you have. If you already have a web developer working alongside you you can also request them to integrate it.


Q: What is included in the support?

A: We ensure that whatever you see in the demo page is what appears on your own website. In addition, any bugs you find will be investigated and fixed!

products.name: Responsive Banner Section (PRO)
products.details:
Responsive banner Shopify section coded by a certified Shopify partner.


It works out of the box with any theme with sections and allows you to:


✓ add a link to redirect on click

✓ open link on new tab or same page

✓ use an image for desktop and a different one for mobile devices

✓ controllable top margin/spacing

✓ controllable top margin/spacing


Installation takes 30 seconds. You can find detailed instructions clicking here.


If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to me, I'll be happy to help:


ezfycode@gmail.com


Thank you!

products.name: Responsive Banner (Free)
products.description:
Having troubles with images on your Shopify theme's sections? They are not looking properly responsive on mobile?

This section coded by a certified Shopify Partner will make all of your images fully responsive across every browser and device. 

Consider taking a look at Responsive Banner Pro as well with many more features:

https://www.fatfreecartpro.com/i/109li?card

Installation instructions can be found below:

https://ezfycode.com/blog/fixing-broken-responsive-images-on-shopify

products.name: Debut Sticky Navbar (Free Version)
products.description:
This is a solution for the Debut Theme to make the navigation bar sticky, coded by a certified Shopify partner.

It contains all the code necessary to implement it on your already existing Debut theme.

Consider taking a look at the Debut Sticky Nav Pro as well. With the pro version you have embedded customization options at the Customize page. You can:

- Make the navbar bar sticky only on mobile, only on desktop or both
- Navbar only on homepage or all pages
- Control font size for navbar items on mobile
- Control font size for navbar items on desktop
- Make the announcement bar sticky only on mobile, only on desktop or both
- Announcement bar only on homepage or all pages
- Control font size for announcement bar text on desktop
- Control font size for announcement bar text on mobile


Besides that It has frequent updates, support and bug fixes:

https://ezfy.e-junkie.com/product/1689723


For installation instructions of the free and pro navbar, check the link below: 

https://ezfycode.com/blog/debut-theme-sticky-navigation-bar-tutorial
